insert into course (Course_Info_ID, Teacher_ID, Class_ID, Classroom_ID, Teach_Time, Begin_Date, End_Date, seat) values (#{courseInfoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{teacherId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{classId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{classroomId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{teachTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{beginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{seat,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select ID, Course_Info_ID, Teacher_ID, Class_ID, Classroom_ID, Teach_Time, Begin_Date, End_Date,seat from course where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select ID, Course_Info_ID, Teacher_ID, Class_ID, Classroom_ID, Teach_Time, Begin_Date, End_Date,seat from course
